message.subject: nwn
message.content:
M1.1. still waiting for the formal pubcomps and acqcomps from JPMorgan and SSB.
[Inform: Mark is still waiting for pubcomps and acqcomps from JP Morgan and SSB]
M1.2. I spent years in NY doing the math though and spoke to Rod for his help (he had great color).
[Inform: Mark spent years in NY doing math and got help from Rod, who seemingly has a tan]
M1.3. The answer is 8-10x ebitda.
[Inform: multiple of earnings before interest, taxes, depreciation and amortization]
M1.4. as an extra check, we put in another multiple for the duke/westcoast deal (approx. 1.7x rate base).
[Inform: as a precaution, another multiple was put in for another deal]
M1.5. Same answer both times.
[Inform: each calculation produced the same result]
M1.6. EV 2.0-2.3 (with a sales hat maybe 2.5), equity value 1.6-1.8.
[Inform: EV, with and without sales hat, and equity value numbers]
Sflink1.6
M1.7. I wouldnt push the sales hat too far though, the duration of contracts on this pipeline do not favorably compare to those on most pipelines in general -- in other words, you could be staring at a "hole" in '04.
[Inform: Mark recommends not pushing sales hat too far, for reasons given]
Sflink1.7
M1.8. (Once I get the precise numbers from the bankers, I'll plug them in -- the answer shouldnt change more than 5%).
[Inform: Mark will plug in precise numbers when he gets them from bankers]
M1.9. What's the next step for me?
[Request-Information: next step for Mark]
Flink1.9
M1.10. Want me to forward to muller/jeff golden?
[Request-Information: should Mark forward this email to Muller or Jeff Golden]
Flink1.10

message.subject: nwn
message.content:
M2.1. I'm glad Mark came to the same conclusion regarding valuation -
[Inform: Kevin is glad Mark came to the same conclusion regarding valuation]
Blink1.6
M2.2. Mitch seemed to indicate a much higher number.
[Inform: Mitch thought the number was much higher]
M2.3. I hope Mark understands that the "hole" in '04 is highly unlikely given the demand and competitve positions.
[Inform: Kevin hopes Mark realizes the so-called hole mentioned earlier is very unlikely]
Blink1.7
Sflink2.3

message.subject: nwn
message.content:
M3.1. Hole is unlikely, but is a real weak point in any sales discussion.
[Inform: sender agrees that this hole is unlikely, but thinks it is a major weak point in sales discussions]
Blink2.3
